Member Function Documentation

void sbIPlaylistWidget::rescanCommands (  ) 

Cause the commands to be re-fetched.

This will cause the playlist to fetch the list of commands again so that any newly added commands will appear in the UI for the playlist

NOTE - Not callable from web pages.

sbIMediaListView sbIPlaylistWidget::getListView (  ) 

Get the view being displayed in the <WebPlaylist>.

Returns:
A medialist view for the currently displayed medialist

void sbIPlaylistWidget::bind ( in sbIMediaListView  mediaListView,
in sbIPlaylistCommands  commands,
in boolean  resize,
in boolean  collapse 
)

Attach the <WebPlaylist> to the view passed in.

Parameters:
mediaListView - the ordered, sorted, selected grouping of tracks to display in the UI
commands - the commands to be used
resize - boolean, if true the playlist will look up the resize_height attribute for the size to resize to.
collapse - apparently no longer used

void sbIPlaylistWidget::showColumn ( in AString  aColumnName  ) 

Make a column show up in the UI.

Parameters:
aColumnName - the name of the column to display

void sbIPlaylistWidget::hideColumn ( in AString  aColumnName  ) 

Make a column disappear from the UI.

Parameters:
aColumnName - the name of the column to hide

void sbIPlaylistWidget::moveColumnBefore ( in AString  aColumnName,
in AString  aBeforeColumnName 
)

Make the named column move before the second.

Parameters:
aColumnName - The column to move
aBeforeColumnName - The column that will be after (to the right of) the first column

void sbIPlaylistWidget::insertColumn ( in sbIPropertyInfo  aPropInfo,
in boolean  aIsHidden,
in long  aWidth,
in AString  aSortOrder,
in AString  aBeforeCol 
)

Add a column indicated by the propertyInfo into the UI.

Parameters:
aPropInfo - the propertyInfo that defines the column data
aIsHidden - if the column should be visible
aWidth - the width of the column
aSortOrder - What direction the sort should be in
aBeforeCol - The column name that the added column should be inserted before

Member Data Documentation

readonly attribute sbIPlaylistClickEvent sbIPlaylistWidget::lastClickEvent

The last click even that occured on this <WebPlaylist>.

This is used only during the propogation of the PlaylistClickEvent event and will only be non-null for a very brief time during that flow.
